arts.ttl: Liverpool Will Have Trouble With This Part of PSG Squad in Round of 16
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain will face Premier League leaders Liverpool in the UEFA Champions League Round of 16. PSG dominated Stade Brestois with a 10-0 aggregate win in the knockout play-off round but now face a much tougher challenge. After last Friday’s draw, Marquinhos, who played against Liverpool in the 2018 group stage, shared his thoughts on […] The post Liverpool Will Have Trouble With This Part of PSG Squad in Round of 16 appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Ousmane Dembélé Achieves Rare Goal Feat, Joining Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo’s Ranks
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain defeated Olympique Lyonnais 3-2 Sunday night at Groupama Stadium, resulting in Ousmane Dembélé joining Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo in an impressive stat. PSG and OL played to a goalless first half, but after the break, both teams found their scoring touch for a thrilling finish. The visitors struck twice in six minutes […] The post Ousmane Dembélé Achieves Rare Goal Feat, Joining Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo’s Ranks appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid Join Liverpool in Pursuit of PSG’s €60M-Rated Talent
arts.sum: Under Luis Enrique, Paris Saint-Germain is bringing in players eager to compete for minutes. No one is guaranteed a starting spot, which led to Xavi Simons’ permanent departure. Despite this approach, players like Simons may eventually feel the need for regular starting opportunities. This can draw interest from other top clubs offering guaranteed playing time […] The post Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid Join Liverpool in Pursuit of PSG’s €60M-Rated Talent appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lyon 2-3 Paris Saint-Germain: League leaders go 13 points clear
arts.sum: As was the case when the two sides met in December, the prevailing storyline in the build-up to Paris Saint-Germain’s Sunday-night clash in Lyon mainly concerned the boardroom rather than…

arts.ttl: Arsenal Unwilling to Accept €135M From PSG for Key Midfielder
arts.sum: In the era of Luis Campos and Luis Enrique, Paris Saint-Germain haven’t made any purchases north of €100 million, but there could be exceptions. During the winter transfer window, the Parisians played the waiting game and secured Khvicha Kvaratskhelia for €70 million. Moreover, they avoided paying any wild demand that Napoli wanted for the winger […] The post Arsenal Unwilling to Accept €135M From PSG for Key Midfielder appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Video: Ousmane Dembélé’s Unstoppable Shot Against OL Extends Hot Streak
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain and Olympique Lyonnais played a scoreless first half, the Parisians found the back of the net twice in six minutes to take a 2-0 lead over Les Gones. In the 59th minute, Ousmane Dembélé entered the box, opened his foot, and curled a shot past Lucas Perri that couldn’t be stopped. The Parisians […] The post Video: Ousmane Dembélé’s Unstoppable Shot Against OL Extends Hot Streak appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Lyon owner John Textor dons a cowboy hat ahead of PSG match after rival's insult
arts.sum: Lyon owner John Textor donned a cowboy hat ahead of his team’s French league home match against rival Paris Saint-Germain on Sunday night in a mocking gesture seemingly aimed at PSG president Nasser Al-Khelaifi. During that July meeting, Al-Khelaifi called Textor a cowboy.

arts.ttl: Video: Achraf Hakimi Breaks Scoreless PSG-OL Match With Stunning Strike
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain and Olympique Lyonnais played a scoreless first half, but early in the final 45 minutes, the capital club finally broke through to take a 1-0 advantage over Les Gones. In the 53rd minute, Bradley Barcola delivered a cross, but none of the PSG players reacted. This allowed Achraf Hakimi to make a run […] The post Video: Achraf Hakimi Breaks Scoreless PSG-OL Match With Stunning Strike appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: West Ham Push to Land Attacker With 29 Goal Contributions Who PSG Are Urged to Sign
arts.sum: With Randal Kolo Muani now at Juventus, Paris Saint-Germain is looking to offload the French striker permanently, whether that’s to the Turin-based club or elsewhere.
